about.title: About me
about.description: Hi, I'm Aksels. Born in Norway but raised in Latvia. I am a motivated Computer Science student at the University of Latvia and a QA Engineer. My education and work experience have given me a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end technologies. I can both develop interactive and responsive web applications and properly test them, both automated and manually.

taskManagement.title: Task Management System
taskManagement.subtitle: React + Laravel Full-Stack Application
taskManagement.description: A modern task management web app featuring user authentication, CRUD operations, and responsive design. Built with React frontend and Laravel API backend. The screenshots showcase the login interface, dashboard with task management, and task creation/editing functionality.

maphaus.title: Maphaus
maphaus.subtitle: Car Tuning Website
maphaus.description: My favorite project that combines my passion for cars with web development. This car tuning website showcases various tuning modifications that are possible for cars. I Built it using React, TypeScript, CSS.

current.description: Studies focused on software development, algorithms, and data structures. The studies have given me skills in web application development and maintenance, as well as a good understanding of the software development process.

current.title: Full Stack Developer & QA Engineer
current.description: Performed manual and automated testing (QA) of websites and mobile applications across various platforms (Android, iOS, Windows), using Postman, TestFlight, Firebase, and Appium (TypeScript) for automated web and mobile app tests. Additionally used HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, WordPress, and Git in daily work on website development and maintenance.

previous.title: Web Developer Intern
previous.description: Developed an application using Zabbix API to get the most useful information about complex devices (such as switches). Gained experience with front-end and back-end technologies.

internship.title: IT Administrator Intern
internship.description: Provided technical support and assistance to employees. Helped with system maintenance and troubleshooting. Gained practical experience with various IT systems and tools.

carRepair.title: Car Repair and Maintenance
carRepair.description: I am passionate about car repair and maintenance. Over time it has become a hobby; I enjoy understanding the mechanics and learning by doing things myself.

gym.title: Fitness
gym.description: I regularly run, do strength training and other physical activities.

other.title: Other Interests
other.description: I enjoy exploring new technologies, reading about car innovations, and keeping up with the latest developments in the tech industry. Additionally, I'm learning Norwegian.

website.title: This Website
website.description: This portfolio website was built by me using React.js and styled-components for a modern, responsive design. It includes smooth animations, dark/light mode, and multilingual support (English, Latvian, and Norwegian) using i18next. The site is fully responsive and optimized for all devices, with a focus on performance and user experience.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Feel free to reach out through these channels
